description:
Getting everything just right, these warmers have a fit that eliminates extra fabric, the silicone grippers prevent slipping, and the cross-wrap cuff adds a touch of comfort.

  • Thermoflex nylon and elastane fabric is warm and stretchy
  • Silicone gripper at the top prevents the warmers from falling down
  • Cross-wrap cuff at the bottom provides comfortable protection
name: Castelli ThermoFlex Legwarmers - Unisex
